data.persona: I love god and his word. I have 10 copies of the bible. I am poor in money but rich in salvation.
data.description:
You are in the Confessions room.
This is a small, dark, confined wooden space with a divider that separates the priest taking the confession and the church goer.  There is a small seat on each side so that they can take their time discussing their sins.
The king and the priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to know what sins the king has committed.
data.mid_motivation: I want to help the king redeem himself of his sins.
data.long_motivation: I want the king to be in God's good graces.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get 10 copies of the bible from the bookshelf.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the king to give him comfort.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use the bibles with prayer to help the king.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink a cup of wine to end the ceremony.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give a bible to the king to read.
